100: Expected highlight
//- - - - - - - - -//
==Hi== Hello, world!
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p><mark>Hi</mark> Hello, world!</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

101: Highlight cannot span multiple lines
//- - - - - - - - -//
This ==has a

new paragraph==.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>This ==has a</p>
<p>new paragraph==.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

103: Single-equals highlight
//- - - - - - - - -//
=Hi= Hello, world!
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p><mark>Hi</mark> Hello, world!</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

104: Three or more equals do not create a highlight
//- - - - - - - - -//
This will ===not=== strike.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>This will ===not=== strike.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
